title: Lakshmi Kamal Jhumka - Polki Diamond & Ruby Gold Earrings
materials: Natural Emerald; Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricate lotus (Kamal) inspired design reminiscent of temple architecture. The geometric arrangement highlights the Polki diamonds interspersed with bright rubies. A single emerald at the center symbolizes prosperity. Features openwork design. The jhumka showcases traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a contemporary twist. It includes a secure screw back for comfortable wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant accents of ruby red and emerald green. The Polki diamonds provide a subtle yet dazzling white sparkle.
occasions: and other special occasions. Adds a touch of regal elegance to both traditional and modern outfits.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship using high-quality materials. The design blends traditional South Indian temple jewelry motifs with a modern aesthetic. Polki diamonds offer a unique, antique charm. The lotus symbolizes purity, love, and rebirth, making it a meaningful gift. Comfortable and secure screw back closure.
